property.name: isSuccessful
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if an operation completed successfully.

property.name: quoteRequest
property.description: A data object representing a customer's request for a price quote.

property.name: messages
property.description: A collection of informational, success, or error messages.

property.name: cart
property.description: A shopping cart or quote object.

property.name: customer
property.description: A data object representing a customer.

property.name: companyUserUuid
property.description: The UUID of a company user.

property.name: metadata
property.description: A collection of metadata.

property.name: unitPriceMap
property.description: A map of unit prices.

property.name: validUntil
property.description: The date until which an entity is valid.

property.name: isLatestVersionVisible
property.description: A flag indicating if the latest version of a quote request is visible.

property.name: customerReference
property.description: A unique reference for a customer.

property.name: value
property.description: A generic value for a property, often used in key-value pairs or translations.

property.name: message
property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: quote
property.description: A data object representing a shopping cart before it becomes an order.

property.name: metadata
property.description: A collection of metadata.

property.name: uuid
property.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

property.name: customerReference
property.description: A unique reference for a customer.

property.name: customer
property.description: A data object representing a customer.

property.name: items
property.description: A collection of items, typically in a cart, order, or list.

property.name: priceMode
property.description: The mode for price calculation, typically "GROSS_MODE" or "NET_MODE".

property.name: code
property.description: A Spryker specific error code.

property.name: status
property.description: A HTTP status code.

property.name: detail
property.description: A detailed error message providing more specific information about an issue.

property.name: companyUser
property.description: A user associated with a company.

property.name: latestVersion
property.description: The latest version of a quote request.

property.name: maxPerPage
property.description: The maximum number of items to show on a single page.

property.name: page
property.description: The current page number in a paginated result set.

property.name: quoteRequestReference
property.description: A unique reference for a quote request.

property.name: pagination
property.description: An object containing all pagination-related data for a list of results.

property.name: withVersions
property.description: A flag to include version information in the response.

property.name: isSuccessful
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if an operation completed successfully.

property.name: quoteTransfer
property.description: A data transfer object representing a quote.

property.name: errors
property.description: A collection of error objects.

property.name: errorIdentifier
property.description: A unique identifier for a specific type of error.

property.name: groupKey
property.description: A key used to group items together, typically in a cart or order.

property.name: sourceUnitGrossPrice
property.description: The original gross price of a single unit.

property.name: sourceUnitNetPrice
property.description: The original net price of a single unit.
